ResearchProjectDef.label: archotech fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through mastery of the tiniest machinery we are able to build archotech fire control towers. These towers allow to control multiple turrets without any human input. Truly a wonder of automated destruction!

ResearchProjectDef.label: cosmic fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Applying the cosmic matter in the circuits of a fire control station allows us to create computers that can control multiple turrets without a human. It is inferior to Archotech Fire Control but it is autonomous.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: One person can control one weapons - it is a fact of life. By applying some circuitry and connecting to a common power grid, we can have that one person control multiple weapon emplacements with reduced efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: By applying advanced microelectronics we can expand upon the basic fire control tower, increasing the bandwidth and the efficiency of the remote control.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultratech fire control tower
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automated systems similar to the ones present in the spaceships will allow us to make the ultimate human-made fire control tower, with greatest efficiency and bandwidth possible for a Rimworld colony.
